summary: A murdered boys spirit seeks revenge by seeking six souls to live again.
cast: Mischa Barton|Devon Sawa|Michael Clarke Duncan|J. Michael Trautmann|Nick Jandl|Stuart Stone|Alanna Janell|Morgan Wolk|Annie Kitral|Patrick de Ledebur|Matthew Willig|Brenden Meers|Jason McCune|Sean Derry|Larry Meyers|Mary Rawson|Jeff Hochendoner|Bill Laing|Rohn Thomas|Antonio Costa|Sarah Vorhees Wendel|Alonzo Vorhees|Tyler Courtad|Scott Ledbetter|Laura Welsh
title: A Resurrection
